actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to permit States the option of providing home and community-based services to low-income individuals with acquired deficiency syndrome (AIDS) or AIDS-related complex (ARC).

summary.text: Medicaid AIDS Amendments of 1986 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to permit States to provide home and community-based Medicaid services to individuals diagnosed as having acquired immune deficiency syndrome (AIDS) or AIDS-related conditions. Authorizes States to limit Medicaid case management services to individuals with AIDS or AIDS-related conditions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to permit States the option of providing home and community-based services to low-income individuals with acquired deficiency syndrome (AIDS) or AIDS-related complex (ARC).
